EmailTemplate.name: AutoRABIT VIP Party at DF17 on Nov.6th|7PM
EmailTemplate.subject: Test
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Tania, Hope you are well.
I wanted to personally invite you to AutoRABIT VIP Party at DF17 on Nov.6th|7PM Pl join us on Monday evening for cocktails and food overlooking the city, and networking with fellow IT execs and the Salesforce DX team.
Would you Pl confirm your availability here? I will add you to the RSVP list.
Thank you for your time.
